extendedInfo.description: Care.com is the worldâs largest destination for helping families find careâand caregivers find jobs.Access and manage all of your care needs conveniently from your phone. The Care.com app is currently available to Care.com members only.FAMILIES LOOKING FOR CARE- Instantly access your jobs, applicants and favorites- Receive notifications when sitters apply to your job - Mark your favorite caregivers so you can easily find their profiles- Message or call sitters directly from your phoneCAREGIVERS LOOKING FOR JOBS- Be the first to discover new jobs near you- Get notified each time a family sends you a message- Reply to jobs instantly and enjoy similar app features! - Easily update your profile including availability, hourly rates and moreUse our app to find your match today. Love Care.com?Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/caredotcomFollow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/caredotcomWHAT'S NEWWith all-new design and all-new features, our Care app is sleeker, faster and more enjoyable to use. Features and Improvements:Updates for Families Looking for Care- Redesigned Messaging: Keep the conversation going and bring it face-to-face.  See everything you need to know about a caregiverâright within your message thread - Filter messages by applicants, jobs or unread - Check the 'alerts' tab for important notifications and updates - Caregiver profiles are redesigned, making it easier to scan through the providerâs information and make decisions  - Search for caregivers by New, Nearby and Best Match - New Family Profiles: Manage everything important to you, all in one place - Update your jobs, view applicants, manage your favorites and give your jobs some personalityAlso- Sign-in easier with Facebook Connect - Post unlimited Date Night Jobs - â¦and moreUpdates for Caregivers Looking for Jobs- Manage and edit your profiles on the fly-upload up to 6 photos, update your bio, availability, hourly rate and more  Search and browse jobs by New, Nearby and Best Match - Scan and read through job details faster and easier with our newly designed job layouts  - Learn more about care seekersâ needs with the addition of âfamily profilesâ Also- Sign-in easier with Facebook Connect - Teen caregivers are now able to use the app

reviews.title: Awesome site!
reviews.comment: Great app. Easy to use and very user friendly for us non-tech types.
reviews.author: Arghavan Schumacher

reviews.title: Low budget &  Weak
reviews.comment: Get current! Make the interface less web-like!!!  Not great for anything but checking a message
reviews.author: Kimberly Pleasant

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: It\'s nice to check things when on the go. However, if you try to respond to a message, the words get all jumbled up. So frustrating I usually just wait until I can get to my home computer.
reviews.author: Rebecca Potoczek

reviews.comment: This app does not work well. It always find a reason to force close. Uninstalling app\tGet it together I want to have this app on my phone
reviews.author: Nae Neal

reviews.title: It\'s alright
reviews.comment: I\'ve had a lot if issues with this app since I\'ve downloaded it. Its really sloe for me and wont let it has nowhere for me to reply to the people who email me. Not to happy that I\'m paying the money I am to not be able to do anything on the app.
reviews.author: Danielle Smith

reviews.title: I like the website
reviews.comment: So I am on this website and before the update the app worked pretty bad but now it works even worse. Whenever I open the app it stops working and then I have to start it again. They should have a new update where they fix the bugs for my Galaxy S3.
reviews.author: Devyn Whittle

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Like the new design, good update :)
reviews.author: Sage K

reviews.title: I love it!!
reviews.comment: Keeps me logged in...can find great sitters and talk to them instantly. I love how easy it works. For all the negative people...update your phones, go to the library and use the website if you are under 18 and don\'t use the app if you don\'t like it!! :) ;)
reviews.author: Melinda Neumann

reviews.title: Just so so...
reviews.comment: Just so so annoying. The icon stopped working for some reason and had to re-install it. Sends me too many emails stating that there are \'\' New\'\' listings when there aren\'t, and too many scammers!
reviews.author: Crystal Fenton

reviews.title: At first I was like \"Meh\" then i was like \"Woah- this is awesome\"
reviews.comment: This app runs like butter. No... melted butter. It\'s sleek and modern, and the design is out of this world.  Everthing.just.works.  Imagine yourself emerging into a place of zen, where finding care is actually as easy as tapping an icon. Posting a job takes seconds.  And sometimes I open the left sliding drawer just because it\'s fun. Favorite screen is my Profile page (obviously), and my favorite tab on my favorite screen is jobs because orange is my favorite color, and those job cards are awesome. And did you see how you can filter your applicants by the job they applied to in the Inbox? Genius. ***** (five stars). One suggestion--could we have some gentle sounds like the flute, gong and monk when receiving messages? It would just give it an even more serene vibe.
reviews.author: Katelyn Friedson

reviews.title: Definitely needs bug fixes...
reviews.comment: I updated a few days ago and I like the layout/navigation of the new app. It\'s also nice to be able to finally go back and look at the job details from your messages. That\'s where the good stops. The app crashes ALL THE TIME, making it sooo annoying to scroll thru a list or refine it. I\'d also like to be able to use it in landscape, but that\'s just personal preference. Useful tool, but it needs it stop crashing!!!
reviews.author: Jennifer Milord

reviews.title: Easy and Convenient
reviews.comment: Love the ease of using this app on my phone! Navigates easily.
reviews.author: Tanya Pimental

reviews.title: Can\'t log in
reviews.comment: Since the last update it won\'t let me log in from my phone. Says I cant log in because of the type of account I have. I can log in fine on computer or from the browser on my phone. Fix please!!!!!!! Does me NO good if I can\'t use it. I pay $20/month for you alls service I should get all access!
reviews.author: Melia Boettcher

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: I just downloaded this app and it won\'t open, please fix
reviews.author: Sarah Jones

reviews.title: Can\'t create an account
reviews.comment: To get started you have to enter an already existing account info or sync your entire Facebook account....what a bummer,I really wanted to sign up
reviews.author: Tiffany Bryan

reviews.title: This is great
reviews.comment: Very easy to use and works well
reviews.author: Rich Tobin
